short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View vegan & vegetarian options across Purdue University

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every day, hundreds of students at Purdue University waste plenty of time searching for food across campus dining courts that fit their dietary needs. This chrome extension speeds up the process by displaying vegan and vegetarian food choices across Purdue's dining courts.

★ View vegan and vegetarian options across the following locations at Purdue University:
1) Earhart
2) Windsor
3) Wiley
4) Ford
5) Hillenbrand
6) 1Bowl
7) Sushi Boss
8) Pete’s Za

★ Coming Soon:
3) PMU restaurants
4) Retail Locations

★ View vegan and vegetarian options across dedicated times at Purdue University:
1) Breakfast - 7AM to 10AM
2) Lunch - 11AM to 2PM
3) Late Lunch - 2PM to 5PM
4) Dinner - 5PM to 9AM

-------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer:
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout or you can set up a filter in Adblock Plus or similar ad blocker tools like AdBlock, uBlock or Adblock Pro.
